Module.Content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd"> 
<html> 
<body> 
<script>
function compose() { 
	var eventData = { title: 'ENTER YOUR TITLE', 
							details: 'Objective:\n\nAgenda:\n\nPre-meeting Homework:\n'
  					  //	attendees:	[{email: 'stuzo.com_q8hge23s8mdka4nm80jk7fdc08@group.calendar.google.com'}]
						 };
	google.calendar.composeEvent(eventData);
}
</script> 
<center>
<button
style="background-color:Crimson;width:300;height:100;font-size:20px;color:white"
onclick="compose()" autofocus>Create a Stuzo Meeting</button> 
</center> 
</body> 
</html>
